about_the_game:
Halloween Survivors finds you in a universe gone mad with every possible creature of the infernal let loose to end all that stand in their way. Shoot, fire, skewer and blast your way through to annihilating the fiending hordes! This spooky season the only treats will be those left by the corpses of the dead!!


Key Features:

Pure Survivors Gameplay:
Experience the core gameplay you're here for as you rip and tear through the seemingly endless waves of untold evils coming for you!

Unlock Weapons and Upgrades:
Command the endless projectiles, explosions, and other worldly magics against every insatiable unimaginable horror! Destroy them before they can destroy you!

Unlockable Characters:
Unlock a pulse pounding array of Halloween characters from the nightmarish unknown to battle the unceasing hordes before they feast on your very soul!

All Original Art:
Completely original pixel art pixeled entirely with blood, sweat, and more blooood!

Boss Battles:
As you wear down the hordes of hell encounter unfathomable bosses that only those with no fear left inside of them can possibly survive!
